title: Immunity-enhancing cocktail protects mice against multiple hospital germs
description: The three-compound formula, provocatively termed a vaccine by its makers, blocked infections by notorious microbes such as MRSA and Pseudomonas aeruginosa

title: Study of 17,000 years of fish fossils reveals rapid evolution
description: Cichlid fishes weren’t the first to colonize Lake Victoria—but they won the speciation race anyway

title: Creators of quantum dots, used in TV displays and cell studies, win chemistry Nobel
description: Moungi Bawendi, Louis Brus, and Alexei Ekimov share award for development of nanoparticles whose size determines their properties
